name: 10K Steps Challenge
creator: John Doe
description: Complete 10,000 steps daily for a week to earn rewards. Track your progress with any fitness app or device.

name: Meditiation Marathon
creator: Sarah Johnson
description: Meditate for at least 15 minutes daily for two weeks. Perfect for beginners looking to establish a mindfulness practice.

name: Strength Training
creator: Mike Williams
description: Complete 3 strength training sessions per week for a month. Focus on major muscle groups and progressive overload.

name: Ultra Marathon
creator: Emma Davis
description: Train for and complete a 50km ultra marathon within 60 days. Includes weekly training plans and nutrition guidance.

name: Yoga Challenge
creator: Alex Chen
description: Practice yoga for 20 minutes daily for 21 days. Suitable for all levels with modifications provided.

name: Cycling Tour
creator: Lisa Brown
description: Cycle a total of 500km over 45 days. Track your rides and share your progress with the community.

name: Nutrition Reset
creator: David Kim
description: Follow a clean eating plan for 28 days. Includes meal plans, recipes, and shopping lists.

name: HIIT Challenge
creator: Jessica Taylor
description: Complete 4 high-intensity interval training sessions per week for 2 weeks. Burn maximum calories in minimum time.

name: Mindful Morning
creator: Ryan Peters
description: Start each day with a 10-minute mindfulness practice for 10 days. Includes guided meditations and journaling prompts.

name: Swimming Challenge
creator: Olivia Wilson
description: Swim a total of 30km over 30 days. Track your distance and improve your technique with provided resources.
